title: Visualmente -\> Tipograficamente
content:
I recently noticed that the blog Visualmente has started a featured called [“Tipograficamente”](http://web.archive.org/web/20071230035004/http:/visualmente.blogspot.com/search/label/Tipogr%C3%A1ficamente), in which the authors plan to ask 100 designers about the typefaces they love and the ones they hate. My Spanish is okay enough that I can understand most of what the designers say (and so far there’s one profile in English).

From the [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20071230035004/http:/visualmente.blogspot.com/2007/05/100-profesionales-100-tipografas.html): _La tipografía más usada, la preferida y la más odiada, en una encuesta única que nadie se animó a hacer. La opinión de los mejores, de aquí y de allá, en castellano, en inglés y en portugués. Desde esta semana, 100 profesionales opinan sobre las 100 tipografías de su vida en VisualMente. Lo que nunca nadie dijo de las tipografías._

 [‹ Herzlichen Glückwunsch](http://web.archive.org/web/20071230035004/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34083 "Go to previous forum topic") [Hitchcock's "Psycho" Logo + typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071230035004/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34082 "Go to next forum topic")
author: auricfuzz

comments.content: I’m going to dust off my Spanish/English dictionary to read this. Looks very interesting.
